professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Engineer with expertise across various SQL Server versions, specializing in ETL processes and SSIS packages. Proficient in troubleshooting, collaboration with offshore teams, and Agile methodologies.

key_responsibilities: Developed and optimized SSIS packages for data integration.
Managed ETL processes for large-scale data extraction and transformation.
Collaborated with development teams to integrate database solutions.
Monitored and maintained SQL Server databases across multiple environments.
Implemented backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity.
Resolved performance issues through tuning and optimization.
Developed complex T-SQL queries for data processing and analysis.
Designed and deployed SSRS reports for business intelligence purposes.
Collaborated with analysts to meet reporting requirements.
Managed SQL Server instances across multiple platforms.
Provided technical support for database-related issues.
Designed and deployed ETL solutions for data migration.
Optimized SSIS packages for performance and scalability.
Collaborated with data engineers on large-scale data projects.
Works on various SQL Server versions for database administration.
Handles ETL and SSIS package development tasks.
Conducts regular maintenance and optimization activities.
